channel.title: PJA Shops issue... STILL ISNT FIXED PLEASE!
channel.description:
I get this error when I try to load up my server:
WARNING: Failed to load the shops for some reason, check the data dir for shops.xml com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: null : null ---- Debugging information ---- cause-exception : java.lang.NullPointerException cause-message : null class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : org.hyperion.rs2.content.Shop path : /list/shop line number : 2 -------------------------------
HOWEVER the path to the file is 100% correct and Idk what the fludgeinhellbottoms the problem is.

Tbh I don’t know how xml loading works, I know text file loading though.
